WorkItem.Description:
After working with the Shell Extension Handlers Samples, I've run into a problem (sort of)
Everything works fine on the Windows Shell as it should, but I can't make it work on the WPF BrowserExplorer control. This control can load the dropbox iconoverlay and contextmenu handlers, so the problem should be on the registration right? I'm searching and trying to find what's different on these registrations.
Any idea of what is done different on the other extension handlers?
Thanks!
